generator.name: timeline-detective-output
notes: Entities are restricted to people, places, and organizations (documents are referenced in `sources`).
This JSON combines data from multiple source documents: a sealed indictment (golden.pdf) and grand jury presentation documents (golden2.pdf).
Minor victims are represented as anonymized person entities (Minor Victim-1/2/3) as named in the indictment.

events.title: Maxwell relationship and property management for Epstein (as alleged)
events.summary: During 1994–1997, Maxwell was alleged to have had an intimate relationship with Epstein and to have been paid to manage his properties.

events.title: Recruiting/grooming and abuse facilitation scheme (as alleged)
events.summary: The indictment alleges Maxwell assisted Epstein in recruiting, grooming, and facilitating sexual abuse of minor girls, including arranging travel and normalizing sexual conduct through staged interactions and massages.

events.title: Interactions with Minor Victim-1 including travel and abuse context (as alleged)
events.summary: Alleged befriending, normalization, group sexualized massages, and encouragement to travel to Epstein residences in New York and Florida; abuse alleged in both locations.

events.title: Minor Victim-2 trip to New Mexico and grooming activities (as alleged)
events.summary: Minor Victim-2 allegedly flew from out of state to New Mexico at Epstein's invitation; Maxwell allegedly engaged in grooming behaviors including an unsolicited massage and encouraging massages of Epstein.

events.title: Minor Victim-3 grooming in London and arranged interactions (as alleged)
events.summary: Maxwell allegedly groomed/befriended Minor Victim-3 in London and arranged interactions with Epstein, encouraging massages with awareness of sexual abuse context.

events.title: Deposition testimony (April 22, 2016) — alleged false declarations
events.summary: Videotaped deposition of Ghislaine Maxwell taken at Boies Schiller Flexner law offices. Questions include whether Jeffrey Epstein had a scheme to recruit underage girls for sexual massages, and about interactions with people under age 18 at Epstein's properties.

events.title: Deposition testimony (July 22, 2016) — alleged false declarations
events.summary: Continued videotaped deposition of Ghislaine Maxwell. Questions include awareness of sex toys or devices in Epstein's Palm Beach house, sexual activities with Epstein, and whether Maxwell ever gave massages.

events.title: Interlochen receives $20,000 gift from Jeffrey Epstein
events.summary: Interlochen Center for the Arts receives a $20,000 charitable gift from Jeffrey Epstein for a new scholarship lodge. The letter mentions that under the charitable contribution act, Epstein is permitted use of the lodge for two weeks each year.

events.title: Flight record - August 18, 1994
events.summary: Flight record dated August 18, 1994.

events.title: Flight record - August 20, 1994
events.summary: Flight record dated August 20, 1994.

events.title: Interlochen letter to Ghislaine Maxwell
events.summary: Interlochen sends a letter to Ghislaine Maxwell regarding an envelope found in the Epstein Lodge that was lodged between the wall and the dresser.

events.title: Flight record - January 3, 1995
events.summary: Flight record dated January 3, 1995.

events.title: Flight record - February 12, 1995
events.summary: Flight record dated February 12, 1995.

events.title: Flight record - November 11, 1996
events.summary: Flight record dated November 11, 1996.

events.summary: Flight record dated May 9, 1997.

events.title: Flight record - May 3, 1998
events.summary: Flight record dated May 3, 1998.

events.title: Maxwell relationship and property management for Epstein (as alleged)
events.summary: During 1994–1997, Maxwell was alleged to have had an intimate relationship with Epstein and to have been paid to manage his properties.

events.title: Recruiting/grooming and abuse facilitation scheme (as alleged)
events.summary: The indictment alleges Maxwell assisted Epstein in recruiting, grooming, and facilitating sexual abuse of minor girls, including arranging travel and normalizing sexual conduct through staged interactions and massages.

events.title: Interactions with Minor Victim-1 including travel and abuse context (as alleged)
events.summary: Alleged befriending, normalization, group sexualized massages, and encouragement to travel to Epstein residences in New York and Florida; abuse alleged in both locations.

events.title: Minor Victim-2 trip to New Mexico and grooming activities (as alleged)
events.summary: Minor Victim-2 allegedly flew from out of state to New Mexico at Epstein's invitation; Maxwell allegedly engaged in grooming behaviors including an unsolicited massage and encouraging massages of Epstein.

events.title: Minor Victim-3 grooming in London and arranged interactions (as alleged)
events.summary: Maxwell allegedly groomed/befriended Minor Victim-3 in London and arranged interactions with Epstein, encouraging massages with awareness of sexual abuse context.

events.title: Deposition testimony (April 22, 2016) — alleged false declarations
events.summary: The indictment alleges Maxwell made false material declarations under oath during a deposition connected to civil litigation (15 Civ. 7344).

events.title: Deposition testimony (July 22, 2016) — alleged false declarations
events.summary: The indictment alleges Maxwell made additional false material declarations under oath on July 22, 2016.

claims.subject: person_maxwell_ghislaine
claims.summary: Maxwell allegedly assisted, facilitated, and contributed to Epstein's abuse of minor girls by recruiting and grooming victims known to be under 18.

claims.subject: person_maxwell_ghislaine
claims.summary: Maxwell allegedly persuaded/induced Minor Victim-1 to travel from Florida to New York on multiple occasions with intent of sexual activity with Epstein.

claims.subject: person_maxwell_ghislaine
claims.summary: Maxwell allegedly involved Minor Victim-1 in group sexualized massages of Epstein and participated in some abuse incidents.

claims.subject: person_maxwell_ghislaine
claims.summary: Maxwell allegedly provided Minor Victim-2 an unsolicited massage in New Mexico while Minor Victim-2 was topless, and encouraged Minor Victim-2 to massage Epstein.

claims.subject: person_maxwell_ghislaine
claims.summary: Maxwell allegedly encouraged Minor Victim-3 to provide massages to Epstein in London with awareness that Epstein would sexually abuse Minor Victim-3 during those massages.

claims.subject: person_maxwell_ghislaine
claims.summary: The indictment alleges Maxwell falsely denied knowledge of a scheme to recruit underage girls and denied interacting with under-18 persons (beyond the named plaintiff) at Epstein properties.

claims.subject: person_maxwell_ghislaine
claims.summary: The indictment alleges Maxwell falsely denied awareness of sex toys, denied that Epstein had sexual activities with others, and denied giving massages (including to Minor Victim-2).

claims.summary: Maxwell allegedly encouraged Minor Victim-3 to provide massages to Epstein in London with awareness that Epstein would sexually abuse Minor Victim-3 during those massages.

claims.subject: person_maxwell_ghislaine
claims.summary: The indictment alleges Maxwell falsely denied knowledge of a scheme to recruit underage girls and denied interacting with under-18 persons (beyond the named plaintiff) at Epstein properties.

claims.subject: person_maxwell_ghislaine
claims.summary: The indictment alleges Maxwell falsely denied awareness of sex toys, denied that Epstein had sexual activities with others, and denied giving massages (including to Minor Victim-2).

charges.title: Conspiracy to Entice Minors to Travel to Engage in Illegal Sex Acts
charges.summary: Alleged conspiracy to persuade/induce/entice/coerce minors to travel in interstate and foreign commerce for illegal sexual activity.

charges.title: Enticement of a Minor to Travel to Engage in Illegal Sex Acts
charges.summary: Alleged enticement of Minor Victim-1 to travel from Florida to New York on multiple occasions for illegal sexual activity.

charges.title: Conspiracy to Transport Minors with Intent to Engage in Criminal Sexual Activity
charges.summary: Alleged conspiracy to transport minors in interstate and foreign commerce with intent to engage in criminal sexual activity.

charges.title: Transportation of a Minor with Intent to Engage in Criminal Sexual Activity
charges.summary: Alleged transportation arrangement for Minor Victim-1 from Florida to New York for illegal sexual activity.

charges.title: Perjury
charges.summary: Alleged perjurious statements during an April 22, 2016 deposition (15 Civ. 7344).

charges.title: Perjury
charges.summary: Alleged perjurious statements during a July 22, 2016 deposition (15 Civ. 7344).

timeline_index.label: Interlochen receives $20,000 gift from Jeffrey Epstein
End of MV-3 London grooming window (approx)

warnings: This output reflects allegations in an indictment and evidence from grand jury presentation documents, not adjudicated findings.
Dates like 1994–1997 are approximate as written in the document ('in or about').
Flight records and deposition transcripts are presented as evidence in legal proceedings.
